item.title: Converting Audio With Media Encoder
item.author: clburlison@gmail.com (Clayton Burlison)
item.description: I received a unique request today from a co-worker of mine. In short, he asked me if I was able to convert an audio clip from a Tascam audio recorder to a lower quality format suitable for our phone distribution system. The real challenge…was I going to be able to do this with the software currently installed?
